import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.css'] }) export class CartComponent { getOrders: Function; constructor(private route: ActivatedRoute) {} ngOnInit(){ let tok = this.route.snapshot.paramMap.get('token'); let user_id = this.loggedUsers.filter(user=> user.token == tok).pop()?.id; // this.callbackRequest.subscribe((res:Dish)=>{ // console.log(res); // }) let fun = this.callbackRequest(1) fun.subscribe((res:Dish)=>{ console.log(res); this.dish = res; }) } buy(){ } remove(){ } }
